# Fig2B

Using an object generated in the ['Spatial Metabolic Analysis'](https://genomicsmachinelearning.github.io/SpaMTP/articles/Mouse_Urinary_Bladder.html#:~:text=subset%20ROI%20object.-,ROI,-%3C%2D%20subset) and ['Additional SpaMTP Features'](https://genomicsmachinelearning.github.io/SpaMTP/articles/SpaMTP_Additional_Features.html#section-adding-he-image-to-spatial-metabolomic-data).



```{r}
#General Libraries
library(Cardinal)
library(Seurat)
library(SpaMTP)

#For plotting + DE plots
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

# This is using an object generated in the 'Spatial Metabolic Analysis' and 'Additional SpaMTP Features'
bladder <- readRDS("./bladder_HE.RDS")
bladder <- subset(bladder, subset = ssc %in% c("2", "5", "6"))

A <- SpatialDimPlot(bladder,group.by = "ssc", images = "slice1", pt.size.factor = 0)
B <- SpatialDimPlot(bladder,group.by = "ssc", images = "slice1", pt.size.factor = 5)
C <- SpatialMZPlot(bladder,mz = 798.5411, images = "slice1", pt.size.factor = 7)+scale_fill_gradientn(colors = viridis::magma(10))
D <- SpatialMZPlot(bladder,mz = 741.5306, images = "slice1", pt.size.factor = 7)+scale_fill_gradientn(colors = viridis::magma(10))
```
